code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ProjectsSection(){const projects=[{title:"Eragonova Website",category:"IT & Systems Administration",description:"Future-proof enterprise website showcasing services and projects with scalable architecture."},{title:"Community Poultry Initiative",category:"Business & Community Development",description:"Coordinated self-reliance project supporting local farmers with feed distribution and training."},{title:"PromisedLand Data Center",category:"IT Infrastructure",description:"Designed hybrid data center deployment with Azure and AWS integration for scalability."},{title:"Professional Branding Campaign",category:"Branding & Documentation",description:"Developed contract-ready corporate profiles, proposals, and reports for NGOs and enterprises."},{title:"Renewable Energy Pilot",category:"Electrical & Electronic Engineering",description:"Implemented solar hybrid systems and conducted safety audits for SMEs in Kumasi."}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"projects",className:"py-16 md:py-20 lg:py-24 bg-[#FAFAF6] dark:bg-[#1E1E1E]",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-6 lg:px-12",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"mb-12 font-bold text-[#111] dark:text-white/90 text-3xl",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",children:projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 rounded-lg bg-white dark:bg-[#121212] shadow hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow duration-200",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-2 text-[#2563eb] dark:text-[#3b82f6]",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400 mb-2",children:project.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-[#444] dark:text-white/70 text-sm leading-relaxed",children:project.description})]},index))})]})});}
